backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage, authorization, user profiles, notes, missions, and file/blob management with pagination and health/diagnostic queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a swipe‑actions UI change to affected frontend components and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all major frontend components and their behaviors.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation of a new Draft fully synced with Live v114 and verifying 1:1 behavioral parity.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variables with light/dark mode definitions and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loads the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post‑restoration freeze notice outlining strict change‑control rules until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start behavior, and icon set.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching and network‑first caching with runtime fallback.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend was restored exactly to Live v114, covering authentication, UI, initialization, and configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper handling theme, providers, and showing intro screen on fresh login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG camera icon with hover animations and decorative effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom border line for visual decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened externally, offering retry or download.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with type‑specific rendering and actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file selection and uploads with progress tracking, using backend actor readiness and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a fixed-position button that opens the folders UI, with disabled and hover states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Provides a dialog to view, create, rename, and delete folders, including swipe actions and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with swipe navigation, delete, download, share, send-to-folder, and external open support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Shows a gallery of files with selection, long‑press detection, previews, and integration with the full‑screen viewer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a unified upload progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Animated intro screen that plays a welcome animation before transitioning to the main app.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and shows a loading state during login.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail editor allowing title edits, task management, progress calculation, and mission save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating new missions with title input and task list assembly, including task toggling and removal.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface with animated Target icon and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Top-level full-screen missions manager that lists missions, handles selection, creation, deletion, and opens detail views.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Floating button that opens the notes interface with animated FileText icon and disabled handling.
frontend/src/components/NotesDialog.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a notes dialog component.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Full-screen notes manager enabling listing, creation, editing, saving, and deleting notes with mobile-friendly editor behavior.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup dialog component.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files between folders or back to the main collection using folder list and mutation hooks.
Implements a swipeable row with drag gestures to reveal edit/delete actions and manages open state with touch and mouse events.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global upload progress bar showing total percent and file count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders a welcome screen with branding, description text, and a login button for Internet Identity.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides actor initialization with retry logic, error handling, and sign-out support based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages multiple upload batches, tracks per-file and aggregate progress, and exposes functions to start and update uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch input via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Wraps mission CRUD operations with React Query using the backend actor and handles cache invalidation and sorting.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes using the backend actor with cache invalidation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders, including pagination, folder management, and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, component styles, and touch interaction optimizations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page that manages authentication state, actor readiness, and displays file uploads, folders, notes, and missions views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers to classify actor initialization errors and extract standardized messaging and error details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities to open URLs externally and download files via browser APIs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic determining how files should open based on MIME category, including viewer, preview, or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type, determines previewability, and returns human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings or short dates.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Provides React Query cache diagnostics for notes and missions plus delete-mutation lifecycle logging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and cleanup for both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list defining the exact frontend contents of Live version 114 for drift detection and baseline validation.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature descriptions, and state/version information for the app.
